meanings.definition: A layer of color or decoration applied to pottery before it is glazed and fired.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully painted the underglaze on the ceramic vase.
meanings.sent2: The underglaze added a beautiful blue design to the plate.
meanings.sent3: The underglaze on the mug made it look like it was wearing a colorful sweater.
meanings.sent4: The underglaze transformed the plain bowl into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The underglaze brought life to the otherwise dull pottery piece.

meanings.definition: To apply a layer of color or decoration to pottery before glazing and firing.
meanings.sent1: She underglazed the clay pot with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: The artist underglazes the ceramics to create unique designs.
meanings.sent3: He underglazed the teapot with a smiley face, making it a fun addition to the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The underglazing process is like adding a personal touch to each piece.
meanings.sent5: Underglazing pottery requires precision and creativity.
